long_description: With sleek looks that would make most casual jackets envious, the Roxy Frequency 2 Jacket makes it easy to start a fitness habit. Lightweight fabric wicks moisture, and extended cuffs with thumbholes warm wrists. Zoned mesh panels enhance ventilation, and fabric gathering details at back cape offer a fun look. Zippered hand pockets store extras and work with your media player. Flat seams let you run farther without chafing, and a rear reflective logo increases visibility. The Roxy Frequency 2 Jacket offers an active fit that's meant to move with you during your run.
short_description: With sleek looks that would make most casual jackets envious, the Roxy Frequency 2 Jacket makes it easy to start a fitness habit.
